籤詩版本二:
Noma ungacisha umlilo ngezinkuni, kuzosha konke, noma ungasha izikhathi eziyizinkulungwane ezintathu, kuzophinde kwenzeke.
Uma ukhathazekile ngenkazimulo nengcebo, kungcono ukuhlanza umzamo olahlekile
詩意:
Le hexagram ifana nokubamba izinkuni ukucisha umlilo.
Qaphela kukho konke.
解曰: Kunezinkulungwane zezinhlelo. Wake wacasuka. Kungcono unganyakazi. Ukwesaba ukudala izinkinga.
籤詩故事一:
◇Chibi War
Ngesikhathi seMibuso Emithathu, ibutho likaCao Cao lalimi ogwini lwaseChibi.
Ujenene we-Sun Quan u-Zhou Yu wahlanganisa ibutho lika-Liu Bei ngokumelene no-Cao Cao.
U-Kongming wasebenzisa umoya wasempumalanga, futhi u-Huang Gai washisa umkhumbi wamaketanga, futhi amabutho amabili alwa kanzima.
Kwakukhona ulwandle lomlilo, futhi ibutho likaCao lanqotshwa. Ngokomlando yaziwa njengeMpi yaseChibi.
◎Qaphela:
鏖, umsindo uthi ㄠˊ. Kusho ukuthi baningi abashonile kule mpi enzima.
聖意: Umndeni usenkingeni uthandazela ukuvikeleka ngokwezimali ama micro and micro transactions awafanele umshado umshwalense awufanelekile abahamba ngezinyawo babhajwe emasimini izikelemu azithandi izilwane eziyisithupha zonakele abantu abatholakali amacala omphakathi mabi mabi .Ukufuduka kuhle Impahla elahlekile Izifo zaseNtshonalanga ziyashaqisa izintaba namathuna ayisicaba.
